review: Excellent media streaming device. Much faster than the old WD TV live plus it replaced. My only concern was that it comes with no native app for streaming my media from my NAS to my TV. I needed to sideload Kodi. I had no idea how good Kodi was compared to the native app on the WD TV Live plus. The Fire TV is extremely fast and everything looks great in 1080.I would like to be able to place shortcuts to my apps on the home screen, but Amazon reserves its homescreen for specific apps only.All in all great device. I have three now (given two away)....
author: Amazon Customer "Greg B"

review: Purchased 2 of these for our televisions as an alternative to a $250 per month cable bill.  I am happy that I can access our Hulu, Netflix and Prime account from one place.  However, there are significant buffering/delay issues with this product.  We can stream multiple netflix applications from tablets using our home WiFi, which is ~50MB per Second, no problem.  However, when only having 1 Amazon Fire TV unit going in the house, the screen freezes (audio continues) and the program stops all together sometimes too.  I am hoping for a software patch soon that fixes this issue but until then I would not recommend.
